title: You Troll or harass team
body:
I just sit and farm wraiths until you /ff, lose, anhero, leave game. 

Tired of getting mad or worked up over people intentionally ruining games for 0 reason so I will start letting them.

Maybe if more people stop letting trolls ruin games or work with them riot will start banning them or they will sink so low they never play with "real" people again.
